name: Quest for the Shaven Yak starring Ren Hoëk & Stimpy
description:
Ren and Stimpy just found a pair of hooves which belong to the great Shaven Yak, who lost them in the last Yak shaving day. Now they must find the Shaven Yak and return him his hooves, or there won't be any more Yak shaving days!

In this platform game the player is prompted to choose playing either as Ren or Stimpy at the start of new life or some stages. Both can jump and shoot (Ren shoots toothbrushes, Stimpy spits), but each one has his own special ability: Ren can perform high jumps, Stimpy can smash things jumping over them. Each character starts the game with three lives.

Throughout levels such as "The Blacker Than Black Forest", "The Stinking Dry Desert" or "The Stinking Wet Bayou", Ren and Stimpy will face most animal enemies, such as birds, frogs, vultures, woodpeckers, snakes, etc. The levels are divided in few or several sub-level, and at the end of each level, they'll face a boss.

They'll also find some unusual weapons, as a slice of bread (which flies in circles), a remote controller (which casts electric waves) and a soap bar (which casts bubbles). If they get hit when using a weapon, they'll lose it, but won't lose health. They'll gain health by picking items like TVs, cash bags, bottles and boots.

shot.caption: Title screen
Password screen, featuring the Shaven Yak
Intro  cutscene: poor Stimpy!
Character selection.
The first level.
When you pause the game, lights go off and you'll see only the character's eyes. Unpause and you'll see what they've been doing while the lights were off...
Ren shooting his defaul weapon, toothbrushes.
Believe it or not, that TV will restore your health!
Ren firing a special weapon: slices of bread.
End of substage, bonus screen.
Stimpy spiting at a woodpecker.
Stimpy can break wood branches with his special smashing jump.
Stimpy dancing at the end of sub-level.
The hydrants mark the checkpoints.
Stimpy and another special weapon: the remote control.
The first boss, a big'n'bad dog.
Level two intro cutscene.
Level two, "The Stinking Dry Desert"
Ren got shot by a lizard!
Vultures will attack with their eggs.
Another special weapon: the soap bar. And don't be fooled by the glass of juice, it is a mirage. In fact, it is a scorpion.
Oh boy, if all their lives are gone, they'll show up in the bathroom crying... but Ren cheers up, as he says it is just a game and they can try again!
Level two boss, a naja.
Level three, "The Stinking Wet Bayou".
I guess you've seen this before, in Pitfall...
That boot is another health item.
